org.tigris.gef.base
Class CmdSpawn

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      org.tigris.gef.base.Cmd
          org.tigris.gef.base.CmdSpawn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class CmdSpawn
extends Cmd

Cmd to open a new editor on the same document as in the current editor. Works by making a new JGraphFrame with a clone of the current editor. The argument "dimension" may be set to th desired size of the new window.

See Also:
Editor, JGraphFrame, Serialized Form

Method Detail

doIt

public void doIt()
Description copied from class: Cmd
Perform whatever Cmd this Cmd is meant to do. Subclasses should override this to do whatever is intended. When the Cmd executes, it should store enough information to undo itself later if needed.

Specified by:
doIt in class Cmd
